title: Senior Business Analyst
description:
2

Required Technical Skill Set


Have strong functional background and understanding of Payments products both international and domestic clearing.
Worked on ISO20022 format in domestic / international clearing
Had worked on difference scheme of products – Real Time Payments, Transfers and Collections.
Capable to handle multiple stakeholders from requirement and solution perspective with Bank and Product Teams.


Must-Have


Knowledge of above-mentioned Technologies
Exposure to Customer-facing roles or Prospect interactions is MUST
Good analytical abilities
Good Communication skills


Role Descriptions / Expectations From The Role


Strong Knowledge of CBPR+ evolution on Payment messages will be added advantage
Works with the Customer to understand the requirement for Requirement and solutioning phase.
Understand the product and solution fitment.
Works on the market/regulatory evolution to provide the needed solution fitment.
Works along with Product Development team to verify the expected functionality / enhancement in the product.
Show more
